question: In which year ‘Hindustan Socialist Republican Army’ was founded?
explanation: ‘Hindustan Socialist Republican Army’ was founded in 1928. Hindustan Socialist Republican Association (HSRA) was a revolutionary organisation, also known as the Hindustan Socialist Republican Army, established at Feroz Shah Kotla in New Delhi by Chandrasekhar Azad, Ashfaqulla Khan, Bhagat Singh, Sukhdev Thapar and Jogesh Chandra Chatterjee.
